products.title: Macrame Weavings
products.description: Soft & smooth twisted string, works wonderfully for a variety of projects. Could also be used for knitting, crochet, weaving, gift wrap, jewelry making, household ties & more!
products.commentlevel: Easy to work with and ever so soft!

products.title: Curved Macrame
products.description: This rope is fantastically thick, soft & so much fun to work with! Could also be used for gift wrap, jewelry making, household ties & more!
products.commentlevel: Requires more strength & dexterity to hold onto and knot than our smaller ropes.

products.title: Indigo Macrame
products.description: This is our best selling rope for Macrame Wall Hangings, Plant Hangers, Boho Home Projects, and all your craft needs. Use it for macrame purses, and our patterns and tutorials.
products.commentlevel: Easy to work with and ever so soft!

homepage.name: Raisa
homepage.profile: Through a range of online tutorials and learning resources I teach crafty folk how to make quality macrame as well as advise inspired creatives on how to transform their handmade hobby, into a profitable side hustle or business.
homepage.question: Do you want to learn how to master macramé patterns?
homepage.question2: Or are you simply looking for a place to source the best quality cotton cord?
homepage.paragraph: Either way, United Knots is here to teach you how to macramé your way to making and designing your own beautiful pieces.
homepage.tiptopic: Beginners Macrame Knots - 6. Double Half Hitch Knots
homepage.tiptext: If you've chosen to take the first steps to learning a new craft, fantastic! Welcome aboard, here is what you need to know in Basic steps Knot 6- How To Tie Double Half Hitch Knots
